resolutionsComments.-: We can configure the default versions for all tools used in all the projects
resolutionsComments.react: React must not be resolved to different versions (that does not work). Furthermore, for hooks to work properly, only a single version of react may be present. When importing files from other workspaces you may need to configure the module resolver to resolve react from the main project's node_modules.
resolutionsComments.react-native: The used react version must match the version installed by react-native. Easiest setup is to enforce the react-native's version of react everywhere.
